name: GRIEF (itch) (CuriousPigeon)
description:
You've met with a terrible fate. Accompanied by Virgil's Rose, a compass of light, make your way through the different stages of grief, helping others or taking advantage of them along the way.

Will you reach acceptance and find your true North? Or will you lose your light and be forever consumed by GRIEF?

Art by: Angélica Ramos

Main music theme: "Alone" by Viren
